text: Yakhana se tadera cakranta sunala, takhana taderake deke pathala ebam tadera jan'ye ekati bhoja sabhara ayojana karala. Se tadera pratyekake ekati churi diye balalah i'usupha edera samane cale esa. Yakhana tara take dekhala, hatabhamba haye gela ebam apana hata kete phelala. Tara balalah kakhana'i naya e byakti manaba naya. E to kona mahana pheresata.
